transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Wo to hai hi nahi meeting mein. Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan sir, namaste.
Customer: Namaste ji.
Executive: Dekhi Techsan se bol raha hu. Aapne bola tha Monday ko baat karoge mere se.
Customer: Ji ji sir, bataiye.
Executive: Haan sir, aapne bola tha kuch solution deoge mere ko.
Customer: Achcha. Ah, haan sir.
Customer: Sir, mere na, ah, jo maine aapse baat karne ke liye bola tha, mere HOD aaye nahi hai. Wo kal aayenge sir.
Customer: To kyunki HOD hi final karenge ki aapki services mein hum aapko kya kar sakte hai ya to services band kar sakte hai, refund kar sakte hai ya phir ah aapki jo customer ki requirement jo aap maang rahe ho wo customer hum aapko de sakte hai. Wahi final kar payenge sir.
Customer: Kyunki unke approval ke bina to main kuch kar nahi paunga na sir. Aur mujhe nahi pata tha ki wo Monday ya Tuesday chutti pe rahenge to wo kal aayenge aur kal nahi kal nahi sir parso ah chutti rahegi office ki parso aayenge sir wo.
Executive: Parso aayenge?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aisa nahi sir aap din din nikalne ke liye bol rahe ho.
Customer: Sir, main din din nikalne ka mera kya fayda hoga aap bataiye. Mera koi fayda thodi hai sir. Main to sir problem ko solve karne ka jo department hai na usme kaam karta hu main. Yani customer support mein kaam karta hu main. To agar customer ki support hi nahi kar paunga main to phir kya fayda hai sir.
Executive: Wahi to.
Customer: Mere meri jo call hoti hai wo recorded line pe call hoti hai. Koi bhi kisi din IT company agar call audit hogi usme main kuch bhi time pass karunga client ke sath usi din meri naukri chali jayegi to mujhe to naukri apni pyari hai sir. Aisa thodi hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha samajh gaya. Main isiliye aapko keh raha hu ki dekhiye main main karne ko main aapko ye bol deta ki sir main aisa kar deta hu main waisa kar deta hu. Kuch fayda nahi hai na usse. HOD aayenge. HOD ke sath baithunga unko aapke sare issues already bata chuka hu. Ek baar phir se remind karaunga aur phir con call pe aapki baat kara dunga ya isi number pe aap main khud call karunga aapko. Main unki baat direct aapse karaunga jo bhi wo bolenge wo final kar denge.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Itna keh raha hu main aapko. Aur kal ki kal kuch hai na sir Guru Nanak Jayanti wagera shayad kuch hai.
Executive: Ek minute main dekh leta hu. Pehle haan Guru Nanak Jayanti hai kal Wednesday ko.
Customer: Haan to is wajah se na head office band rahega sir.
Executive: Achcha. To parso hi parso hi aayenge. Parso main aapki 100% direct baat kara ke aur jo bhi wo bolenge hum kar denge sir aapke liye.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Baki sir aap emergency mein holiday liya tha aapne mujhe bata rahe the.
Customer: Haan sir kuch baat hui thi.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: To parso call karu sir aapko?
Customer: Main khud phone kar lunga aapko ya aap mujhe call kar lena koi dikkat nahi hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Thank you.
Executive: Okay. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs a solution to his issue.

- Customer's HOD is on leave.



Resolution:

- Executive informed HOD will arrive day after tomorrow.

- Executive will arrange a call with HOD.

- HOD will finalize the solution.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- hod, solution, holiday, guru nanak jayanti
